main event: A military observation reported a single unidentified object observed in the Atlantic on November 20, 1953.
interesting points: The object was described as egg-shaped and silver in color,Estimated altitude was approximately 55,000 feet,The observation lasted around 1.5 minutes,The course of the object was noted as NNE,An analysis concluded it may have been a rawin balloon.
sighted object: one unidentified object, egg-shaped and silver
